Preprocessor definitions

#define __agwsubs_h__

Bit masks for AGWPE interface status

#define AGWPE_ACTIVE 0x0001

We have a connection to another station

#define STATION_CONNECTED 0x0002

No tn client connected but server is listening

#define TN_LISTENING 0x0008

A tn client is connectd

#define TN_CONNECTED 0x0010

This interface is in command mode

#define CMD_MODE 0x0020
